short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With LockTheLoad (LTL), negotiate and communicate across major commercial  Load boards, making load booking efficient and profitable

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LockTheLoad Chrome Extension - Book Loads Faster with One-Click Emails, Instant Factoring Checks, and Smart Load Filters.

LockTheLoad helps Truck Carriers and Dispatchers book loads faster. It automates broker emails, instantly checks factoring scores, hides duplicate loads, and filters out unwanted options—so you can focus on securing the best and most profitable opportunities.

Start with a FREE TRIAL and see the difference in your workflow.

Key Features:
✔ One-Click or Automated Emails: Send broker emails instantly without repetitive typing—just one click or fully automated.

✔ Instant Factoring Score Checks: Automatically display brokers’ factoring scores directly on your load board—no manual searches.

✔ Smart Load Filters: Hide duplicate loads, prioritize trusted brokers, and filter by payout, location, and more.

✔ Route Planning: Integrates with Google Maps for quick and efficient trip planning.

✔ Profit Calculations: Calculate profitability instantly, factoring in costs like fuel and tolls.

Why LockTheLoad?

Save Time: Automate tasks and focus only on the best loads.

React Faster: Secure loads with real-time notifications and advanced filters before your competition.

All-in-One Solution: Combines email automation, factoring checks, and load filters in one simple tool.

Works Everywhere: Seamlessly integrates with DAT One, TruckStop, and other major load boards.

How It Works:

Install LockTheLoad from the Chrome Web Store.
Log in to your load board (DAT, TruckStop, etc.).
Set preferences for load filtering and broker criteria.
Let LockTheLoad automate emails, factoring checks, and load management.
Try LockTheLoad for free, and book loads faster today!

Have questions? Reach us at admin@locktheload.com or visit our website at www.locktheload.com.




LockTheLoad - Faster Broker Communication for Better Freight Management
This Chrome Extension simplifies freight booking for Truck Carriers and Dispatchers with automated broker communication, real-time factoring checks, and advanced filtering tools. Focus on securing the best loads faster and more efficiently.
Start your FREE TRIAL today and see the difference!
Key Features
✔  Automated Emails: Send pre-filled and scheduled broker emails with just one click.
✔  Duplicate Load Hiding: Automatically remove duplicate entries for a cleaner board.
✔  Verified Broker Ratings: Prioritize loads from brokers with high factoring scores and trusted payment histories.
✔   Factoring Scores on Your Board: View RTS broker ratings directly on your load board.
✔   Google Maps Integration: Plan trips quickly with Google Maps.
✔   Accurate Deadhead: Calculate O-DH using your truck’s exact location on the map.
✔   Profitability Analysis: Instantly calculate profits based on fuel, tolls, and deadhead costs.
✔   Custom Filters: Adjust results by payout, location, mileage, and other criteria.

Why LockTheLoad?

Save Time: Automate broker communication and repetitive tasks.
Book Smarter: Use advanced filters and real-time factoring insights to secure the best loads.

All-in-One Tool: Combines communication, filtering, and profitability tools in one platform.

Works Everywhere: Compatible with DAT One, TruckStop, and more.

How It Works
Install LockTheLoad from the Chrome Web Store.
Set your preferences for filters and broker criteria.
Let LockTheLoad manage emails, verifications, and filtering for you.
Try LockTheLoad FREE today and book better loads faster!

Need Help? Contact us at admin@locktheload.com or visit www.locktheload.com.
